releases.notes: No real changes, just demo for release tool.

name: Wolfenstein 3D Pain Face
description:
Show your level of pain with a Wolfenstein 3D inspired pain face.

 * Use W'bal, heart rate or power output for the pain source.
 * State of the art graphics (for 1992)
 * May induce feelings of nostalgia.
 * Mein Leben!!!

releases.notes:
version 1.6.6
- adds the ability to save a points leaderboard score format for reuse on other events.  It also includes two pre-defined formats for ZRL and DRS.  Note that the ZRL format has a fin score of x..1 and I haven't implemented that x (meaning the number of racers) yet, hopefully I can get to it before finals in April.  Also note that if the DRS FIN score format is wrong, you can blame @Andrei H because it's a copy and paste from https://discord.com/channels/744994375469367316/1187497643946037259/1342448423672221736 
- You can also import/export a score format to JSON for sharing with others.  I only do a very crude validation on the JSON when importing, I'll make this better in a future version (maybe).
- the "All categories" option will only appear if all cats are doing the same route and number of laps

name: Zenmaster
description:
Arend's Mod Collection

* Fully customizable route elevation profiles
* See the active powerups in your group when the HUD is off
* Segment leaderboards
* Preview route and segment profiles
* Pace partner routes and current locations
* Lap data windows for workouts
* Leaderboards for points races
